titleStmt.title: A paradise of prayers containing the purity of deuotion and meditation / gathered out of all the spirituall exercises of Levves of Granado ; and Englished for the benefit of the Christian reader.
titleStmt.author: Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588.
Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Field for Mathew Law, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard neere vnto S. Austines gate,

notesStmt.note: Translated by Thomas Lodge?--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Errors in paging: p. 189-192 skipped in the numbering; p. 129 and 132 misnumbered 229 and 232 respectively.
Imperfect: cropped, tightly bound and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard neere vnto S. Austines gate
